thread.title: Priyanka Chopra And Jeffrey Dean Morgan At Golden Globes 2017 Have Us All Giggling
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra And Jeffrey Dean Morgan At Golden Globes 2017 Have Us All Giggling

title: Priyanka Chopra And Jeffrey Dean Morgan At Golden Globes 2017 Have Us All Giggling
text:
facebook 
Since making her Hollywood debut with the T.V. show, Quantico , Priyanka Chopra has been on an inspiring uphill journey. With talk shows, awards, and ever increasing wit and charm under her belt, she's been on a roll! 
At the much awaited Golden Globes 2017, she was no different. She looked fabulous as she took to the stage, with the hottie Jeffrey Dean Morgan, to present the award for best performance by an actor in a T.V. series, in the genre of drama. The two of them owned not only the stage, but also the backstage, in this giggly banter that has us all blushing. â€” Golden Globe Awards (@goldenglobes) January 9, 2017 Image Source: Picture Credits: Ibtimes
